name: The Light Path (Rengifs)
description:
You play as a little fox protecting a little forest spirit. Your goal is to escort him to a safe place, where he can protect the entire forest. Be careful as the forest is overrun with shadows that will scare your spirit friend.

Made during the Global Gam Jam 2021 with the theme "Lost and Found"

Credits:

Delaunay Julien = Programmer / VFX Artist

Thomassin Grégoire = Programmer

Giner Romain = Sound Designer

Zorzopian Chloé = Character Artist / 2D Artist

Calzia Calvin = Environment Artist

Roux Tristan = 3D Artist / VFX Artist
